data.name: BenchmarkDataNLP.jl
data.description: Generate synthetic text from a variety of methods, eg. Context Free Grammars (CFGs), with parameterized complexity to test your NLP methods (like LLMs)

evidence: "BenchmarkDataNLP.jl is a Julia project ... that generates synthetic text datasets for natural language processing (NLP) experimentation"

"You can quickly obtain controlled, structured text for model prototyping, or debugging." and example calls like `generate_corpus_CFG(...)` show it is run as a tool to produce datasets, not imported as a low-level dependency.

Installation instructions: "add https://github.com/mantzaris/BenchmarkDataNLP.jl" and "for development, clone the repo `git clone https://github.com/mantzaris/BenchmarkDataNLP.jl`" indicate distribution via the GitHub source repository.
